name: The Wand
overview: An English language fantasy themed text adventure written by Mike Doran in 1988. You are the assistant of Menra the Magician. Dran the evil wizard has stolen Menras wand and his gold. The magician is powerless without his magic wand and the people of Ghopasia are very angry that their cherished treasure is gone. It is now your task to return the wand and the gold to central-square of Ghopasia. But be careful, the wizards evil companions are ready to destroy you on your mission.
